column4: Hi..Awesome distro, only complaint is that NTFS filesystems don't seem to work by default..Could you add eg "Captive NTFS" to Ubuntu default install..? It's a wrapper for using the Windows NTFS driver on Linux, apparently pretty stable
hmm..You mean the code in Windows or something else..? Couldn't you just autodetect it from the hard drive or something..
or is the Captive system itself on some weird license?
the reason ntfs writes don't work by default is a windows issue, not an ubuntu issue
